items.name: DH Kim - Ingine Inc Korea
items.text: Innovation Chapter’s involvement through Ingine Lanka in exploring the wave energy potential and project initiation in Sri Lanka has been instrumental in Ingine’s footstep in Ocean Renewables in the South Asian Region

items.name: Gaurav - CEO of Digitalmarket
items.text: I've never met a web developer who truly cares about their clients' success like TT does.

items.name: Sri Laan - Germany
items.text: Not only did he develop a stunning website for our brand, but he also organized and executed a professional photoshoot for our products. Given our hectic schedules, Lakshitha’s comprehensive service was invaluable. We highly recommend him for anyone seeking a seamless, all-in-one solution for their Shopify e-commerce platform.
